snippet: A statement posted on Facebook in the name of the Free Syrian Army announced a tactical retreat by rebel fighters from Baba Amr, a neighborhood in the city of Homs that has been under sustained assault by government forces for more than three weeks.
abstract: A statement posted on Facebook in the name of the Free Syrian Army announced a tactical retreat by rebel fighters from Baba Amr, a neighborhood in the city of Homs that has been under sustained assault by government forces for more than three weeks.

headline.main: Complete Text of Syrian Rebel Statement on Retreat From Homs District
